name: Shirahoshi
text:
On Play: Play up to 1 cost 5 or lower (Sea King) or (Fishman Island) type Character card from your hand. 
Activate: Main: You may rest this Character. Up to 1 of your (Sea King) type Characters can attack Characters on the turn it's played.

effect.text: Play up to 1 cost 5 or lower (Sea King) or (Fishman Island) type Character card from your hand.
You may rest this Character. Up to 1 of your (Sea King) type Characters can attack Characters on the turn it's played.
